title: Meaning of life
description: In this quiz we can see your thoughts about the meaning of life. That's not a thing too many people complains for, but that might be interesting to see what you think about it.

questions.title: What matters in your life?
options: Time - It's important of having time sense of everything we do.
Happiness - It's important to be happy with what we do.
Money - It's important to have money to do what we want.

questions.title: Money is important for you?
options: Yes, because with money we can have less stress
No, because money is not everything

questions.title: When time is urgent to keep in mind?
options: When we are dealing with health issues
When we are in set of meetings

questions.title: Tell us more about your thoughts about time and money :)
